caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI'I, Respondent/Plaintiff-Appellee v. CORNELIUS WESLEY

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CR. NO. 07-1-0220(2))
opinion.attorneys: Leslie K. Iczkovitz, on the application for petitioner/defendant-appellant.

center.underline: ORDER ACCEPTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: ACOBA, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by Recktenwald, C.J., Nakayama, Acoba, Duffy, and Circuit Judge Border, assigned due to a vacancy.
opinion.opinion_text: The Application for Writ of Certiorari filed on February 2, 2011 by Petitioner/Defendant-Appellant Cornelius Wesley Durham is accepted and will be scheduled for oral argument. The parties will be notified by the appellate clerk regarding scheduling.Page 1
